Import libraries
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(rethinking)
```

##### Review of prior pediction using the milk data of chapter 5
Import data
```{r}
dag5.1 <- dagitty("dag{
                  A -> D
                  A -> M
                  M -> D
}")
coordinates(dag5.1) <- list(x=c(A=0, D=1,M=2),
                            y=c(A=0,D=1,M=0))
drawdag(dag5.1)
```
